Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xae\x80\xe4\xbd\x93\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Simplified Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xb9\x81\xe9\xab\x94\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Traditional Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe6\x97\xa5\xe6\x9c\xac\xe8\xaa\x9e (Japanese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 (Korean)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe0\xb9\x84\xe0\xb8\x97\xe0\xb8\xa2 (Thai)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\x91\xd1\x8a\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 (Bulgarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xc4\x8ce\xc5\xa1tina (Czech)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDansk (Danish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDeutsch (German)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tKinetic Void Basics\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
by Kaypix
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
This guide is meant to help users learn the basics of playing Kinetic Void, including keybindings, shipyard UI, sector UI and commands in space. This guide will be a living, breathing thing and will be getting updated throughout the week....

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xae\x80\xe4\xbd\x93\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Simplified Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xb9\x81\xe9\xab\x94\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Traditional Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe6\x97\xa5\xe6\x9c\xac\xe8\xaa\x9e (Japanese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 (Korean)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe0\xb9\x84\xe0\xb8\x97\xe0\xb8\xa2 (Thai)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\x91\xd1\x8a\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 (Bulgarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xc4\x8ce\xc5\xa1tina (Czech)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDansk (Danish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDeutsch (German)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tKinetic Void Basics\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
by Kaypix
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
This guide is meant to help users learn the basics of playing Kinetic Void, including keybindings, shipyard UI, sector UI and commands in space. This guide will be a living, breathing thing and will be getting updated throughout the week....
\r\n\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHow To Make a Supplementary iPad Flight Control Panel\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
by [PG] Galahir950
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
A simple guide that shows you how to use your iPad as a supplementary flight control panel....
\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\r\n\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDust on your Camera?\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
by Kaypix
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
Simple guide on how to remove the dust particles from the camera in Kinetic Void...
\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tI get the same error over and over about some NullReference related to some objetcs, the list is long and can\'t scroll thru it.

Also, the faction panel doesn\'t allow me to scroll, I can only see 5 factions and about 4 standings for each of them, and I have about 10 different factions in my universe.

Sometimes guns stop firing on targets which are locked, even if guns are set to offensive and there\'s only 1 target left.\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tOct 12, 2014 @ 12:19pm \r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tThis might not be the right place, but I cannot find the Bug Thread for this release...

I have a problem with closing the Console. I cannot clear the contents (which is fine) nor can I close the console, which is a problem because I cannot access the tools that are behind the console, like the Galaxy Map, etc. I know there are shortcut buttons, but I would like to close the console if possible.

Also, I am having difficulty with Combat. Specifically, I am not able to control my Weapons Groups. When I lock onto an object with "c" I should be able to hit the number "1" or whatever number to use that weapons group, no? Or am I missing something...

Thanks!\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xae\x80\xe4\xbd\x93\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Simplified Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xb9\x81\xe9\xab\x94\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Traditional Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe6\x97\xa5\xe6\x9c\xac\xe8\xaa\x9e (Japanese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 (Korean)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe0\xb9\x84\xe0\xb8\x97\xe0\xb8\xa2 (Thai)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\x91\xd1\x8a\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 (Bulgarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xc4\x8ce\xc5\xa1tina (Czech)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDansk (Danish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDeutsch (German)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tWell I do hope it\'s live. I have been trying for an hour to launch the game in the Dev branch and it gives me an error every time. I can\'t fix it so I\'m having to simply give up on that. So far I haven\'t seen any of the content. The three weapons that are supposedly "electromagnetic" do not say that they deal Electromagnetic damage so I cannot find them.\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\tThis dev build doesn\'t seem to have and executable in it... no exes at all in the common/Kinetic Void folder. just _CommonRedist, EmptySteamDepot, Kinetic Void_Data, and SaveFiles.
No bin or exes in any of the folders\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tSep 25, 2014 @ 6:03am \r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tHey guys, To keep up with the current issue of the Dev build check out this thread here. http://steamcommunity.com/app/227160/discussions/10/35222218963713563/

This is a development build, the live build has not gone out this month due to the overhaul of the Unity engine to Unity 5. We wanted to make sure we got all the bugs worked out before pushing the patch live such as the one we are experiencing. This doesn\'t seem to affect everyone and we are currently looking into why it is only effecting some people.\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t#6\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xae\x80\xe4\xbd\x93\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Simplified Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xb9\x81\xe9\xab\x94\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Traditional Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe6\x97\xa5\xe6\x9c\xac\xe8\xaa\x9e (Japanese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 (Korean)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe0\xb9\x84\xe0\xb8\x97\xe0\xb8\xa2 (Thai)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\x91\xd1\x8a\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 (Bulgarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xc4\x8ce\xc5\xa1tina (Czech)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDansk (Danish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDeutsch (German)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\tI can\'t seem to get far in this game. There are no missions, and the only way I have found to make money is to mine roids, which gets boring. I want some combat while still in friendly space.\t\t\t

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\t\r\n\r\n'][b'\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\r\n\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\r\n\t\tBuild D14 Is live! :: Kinetic Void Events & Announcements\r\n\t\r\n\r\n\t\r\n\t\r\n\t\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\r\n\t\t\n\n\n\n\n\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\r\n\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\r\n\t\r\n\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\r\n\t\t\r\n\t\t\r\n\t\t\r\n\t\r\n\t\r\n\t\r\n\t\r\n\r\n\r\n

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tAug 13, 2014 @ 6:52am \r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tSince I loaded this new build my screen looks like a failed attempt at red/blue 3d. All of the graphics, except the Kinetic Void logo are split into two parts - one red, the other blue, about an inch apart.

I\'m running win 8.1 64 with a NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t#2\r\n\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

Report this post

\r\n\t\t
REASON
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t
Note: This is ONLY to be used to report spam, advertising, and problematic (harassment, fighting, or rude) posts.

Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t
Originally posted by Fenrir:
Does anyone know what the developer KV is planing? If he isn\'t doing anything with the game he should let the comunity get in and help develop it.
You\'re more than a year late to that party.
And it\'s as close to official, this game is dead and nothing else will come of it. The lead dev has gone DNF and the other two have been working elsewhere for quite some time and have distanced themselves from this project and the lead dev.\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t#6\r\n\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\tThen is there any way for the comunity to take controle of it? Hell, even just mod it or something? Sure AVORION is ok, but I still realy really like the feel of KV. I mean, is the guy even willing to sell the rights to the game? If he doesn\'t want to do anything with it I\'ll take it.\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t
Originally posted by Fenrir:
Then is there any way for the comunity to take controle of it? Hell, even just mod it or something? Sure AVORION is ok, but I still realy really like the feel of KV. I mean, is the guy even willing to sell the rights to the game? If he doesn\'t want to do anything with it I\'ll take it.
Nope.^

The guy has been given offers to buy the IP(at least 5000$ USD was offer here in the forums) and either refused or didn\'t bother responding (like when he got all the signed paper work from someone who was willing to work for free).

The dev won\'t release the source code (or project files - whatever the term is) so what there is here is all there will ever be here.

Don\'t worry, other space sims will come along and hopefully one will focus really heavily on the building and customization aspect like KV tried to.\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

Looks like I\'m going to have to learn how to use Unity engine and make a carbon copy of this game so I can at least add to it. Why do I torture myself like this. \t\t\t

That game was dead for about 5 years, then someone found out how to mod it and get its multiplayer function working. So stop going on about how Kinetic Void is dead and we should get rid of it.\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t
Originally posted by Fenrir:
Just because it\'s abandoned now doesn\'t mean you guys need to hate on it. And it someday could make a comeback. Me and my friends play a game called "Treasure Planet battle at procyon". That game was dead for about 5 years, then someone found out how to mod it and get its multiplayer function working. So stop going on about how Kinetic Void is dead and we should get rid of it.

We can\'t "Figure out how" to mod this. Procyon dev\'s gave out the source code to loyal fans/supporters that were also devs. No one here fits that description.

There are no fans left that LumberingTroll hasn\'t damaged/ruined his relationship with that can/would write a mod/mods. Even the other devs that worked on this title originally wouldn\'t come back or do any modding for free (they got screwed).

Kinetic Void IS DEAD end of. If you want there to be anything more then you are literally going to have to give up on this (just like the developer) and make your own game.

Again you are really late to this "party". The discussions around here are the only discussions happening anywhere about Kinetic Void and you can see the tone. The game didn\'t die from lack of interest or support from anyone but the dev and he doesn\'t even want to sell the source code or the IP of the game so... He killed it and is keeping it dead.

Eveyone here is just asking for this incomplete and abandoned game to be removed from Steam like all the other "games" that fit that description.

Don\'t support bad games on Steam dude. If you really want this game that bad, contact LumberingTroll about working on it with him. He doesn\'t want this game to improve/develope further and he is the only one that can make that decision.

I hope you find something more worthwhile to have hopes about ;-) Have you ever heard of Star Citizen? LMAO\t\t\t

Originally posted by Zuleahbh:
Originally posted by Prince Rahl:
The dev won\'t release the source code (or project files - whatever the term is) so what there is here is all there will ever be here.

As was discussed previously with the remaining dev its less that he "won\'t" release the source its more that he can\'t as he doesnt own exclusive rights to it.
Right, and the other people who co-own the rights are still "waiting for agreed upon funds". So until "the remaining dev" (the lead developer/project lead/Majority shareholder of the IP) "dispenses the funds" to said other parties we won\'t be seeing the source code.

That\'s a more specific way of saying what I said, hope that helps clear up any previous and further discussions.\t\t\t

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

Originally posted by mrdanlb:
This game has sooooo much potential in it yet that it is mind boggling. I haven\'t played it in while because I was waiting for other bugs to be fixed and other features to be added.

So does a brick, and if you keep praying perhaps that brick will turn itself into a building.

Originally posted by Fenrir:
Does anyone know what the developer KV is planing?

LumberingTroll is off complaining about Kickstarters that aren\'t delivering what they described for his backing money. Sound familiar? Those who were expecting multiplayer DLC for KV that was to be worked on right after release will have to wait until LT is done "slaving away" at his "new" game store he\'s been running for a while. So long and thanks for the game store, sorry if you think your money was wasted on a product that never really arrived outside of a ship builder.

Originally posted by Lnchb0xMarathon:
i know i still keep my fingers crossed that theyre going to upload a new patch one day

Since the devs split due to "seeing the well running dry/creative differences" (the reason changed a bit often for a while), LT went DFE upon all of his posts here, the "What would you want to see in Kinetic Void in future updates?" thread was just used to bait for an upcoming holiday sale, then the chances of a new update are most likely astronomical.\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tSep 25, 2017 @ 3:39pm \r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t
Originally posted by Fenrir:
@l\'Original. We get it, KV is suposed to be dead, yada yada yada. And if you know it\'s dead, why bash those who have hope?

Not a bash at all, just pointing out the reality of the situation for information\'s sake so folks can look towards other games/refunding this one if they are able to. The thread about "What would you want to see in Kinetic Void in future updates?" was just to bait more sales for the 2016 Steam Summer Sale, as work could have progressed and it would have been a sign of hope. Instead, after the sale Darkhog was offered no further contact.

It has to fall into the public domain at some point.

Not to be morbid or even wish it upon the devs (as I actually like redemption stories than the usual scam bait around Steam) but that would take about 70 years after the authors are dead given the current US copyright laws.\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t#14\r\n\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tLnchb0xMarathon\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tSep 25, 2017 @ 5:59pm \r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t
Originally posted by l\'Original:
Originally posted by mrdanlb:
This game has sooooo much potential in it yet that it is mind boggling. I haven\'t played it in while because I was waiting for other bugs to be fixed and other features to be added.

So does a brick, and if you keep praying perhaps that brick will turn itself into a building.

Originally posted by Fenrir:
Does anyone know what the developer KV is planing?

LumberingTroll is off complaining about Kickstarters that aren\'t delivering what they described for his backing money. Sound familiar? Those who were expecting multiplayer DLC for KV that was to be worked on right after release will have to wait until LT is done "slaving away" at his "new" game store he\'s been running for a while. So long and thanks for the game store, sorry if you think your money was wasted on a product that never really arrived outside of a ship builder.

Originally posted by Lnchb0xMarathon:
i know i still keep my fingers crossed that theyre going to upload a new patch one day

Since the devs split due to "seeing the well running dry/creative differences" (the reason changed a bit often for a while), LT went DFE upon all of his posts here, the "What would you want to see in Kinetic Void in future updates?" thread was just used to bait for an upcoming holiday sale, then the chances of a new update are most likely astronomical.

thanks for your valued input captain obvious! ill write that down in my useful and valueable things people have said to me online notebook.\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xae\x80\xe4\xbd\x93\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Simplified Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xb9\x81\xe9\xab\x94\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Traditional Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe6\x97\xa5\xe6\x9c\xac\xe8\xaa\x9e (Japanese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 (Korean)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe0\xb9\x84\xe0\xb8\x97\xe0\xb8\xa2 (Thai)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\x91\xd1\x8a\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 (Bulgarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xc4\x8ce\xc5\xa1tina (Czech)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDansk (Danish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDeutsch (German)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tSep 25, 2017 @ 3:27pm \r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t
Originally posted by Quarex:
Aw man. I never even got to name my own game element. Which I just now realized I could have done by looking how much I paid on Kickstarter.

Look at how many got burned on the later tiers, for example:

Pledge $55 or more
Previous rewards, plus a copy of our first expansion which will include multiplayer, we will begin development on this as right after the launch of Kinetic Void.

ESTIMATED DELIVERY
Aug 2013
248 backers

As for the OP\'s query about the situation of the studio - they are now a miniatures game store in a shopping mall under the same company name. Backers may do with that information what they will, though it would be far more preferable if the devs can look into fulfilling their contractual obligations as per the KS contract they signed by taking money for the backer rewards, or refunding to absolve them of those obligations.\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\tLast edited by l\'Original;\r\n\t\tSep 25, 2017 @ 3:28pm\t\t
